Sergei Borodin♪12.01.2024 at 23:080
A major fire took place on the evening of 12 January in the city of Voljsky. The fire erupted around 9:00 p.m. in an unopened building leaving town to report. The second floor of the building burned things and trash. Preliminary...

The police took a second-year-old child to a hospital in Volgograd province

Sergei Borodin♪12.01.2024 at 10:540
In the Volgograd region, police officers assisted the mother in bringing the sick child to a medical facility. The kid's got a fever up, he started suffocating. My mother took a sick child to a doctor in her car. But at the entrance to Volgograd, a woman...

The wolf is blinded to one eye after rectifying the wrinkles

Sergei Borodin♪11.01.2024 at 14:310
In the city of Volzh, criminal proceedings have been instituted against a 37-year-old woman suspected of providing cosmetological services that do not meet the requirements of security (art. 238 of the Criminal Code). According to the " Volge Truth " in the CDU press service on Volgograd province, according to...

Fat is missing: milk and butter from the Volzhsky were suspected of falsification

Sergei Borodin♪11.01.2024 at 12:130
The Regional Office of the Rosselhodsor reviewed the products of the Volga manufacturer of the Small. Milk and cream oil appear to be suspicious. " In the course of studies carried out at the FGB, the Rostov Reference Centre of Rosselhoznadzor " , a sample of milk from the drinking pastorized, 3.2 per cent and the oil from the plume, 72 per cent, specialists...
Find out more.

In Volgograd, the cargoer stole 140,000 from the expeditioner from the Volges.

Oleg Hadi♪11.01.2024 at 09:240
Police officers detained a 51-year-old consignor suspected of stealing money from a freighter in the city of Voljski. According to the Wolzh's truth in the press service of the MVD in Volgograd oblast, a 39-year-old expediter of a Volj firm that...

In the Volgograd region, on 10 January, a drone was shot down

Sergei Borodin♪10.01.2024 at 16:270
An unmanned aerial vehicle was shot down on Wednesday, 10 January 2024 over the territory of the Volgograd region. Andrei Bocharov, head of the region, has reported this in social networks. The drone is hit by the RF Minor. The governor noted that the victims and injuries...
Find out more.

In the Volzha, PLANETALTO route 24 (a) ran into a sub-machine cam.
